item.title: Top private school 'failed to protect pupils' from sexual and physical abuse
item.description: Children at ex-prime minister Tony Blair's former school, Fettes College in Edinburgh, were abused by both teachers and other pupils over decades.

item.title: Is the US preparing to strike Iran?
item.description: Satellite images show a steady and significant build-up of US military forces in the region.

item.title: US YouTube star IShowSpeed to get Ghanaian passport as Africa tour ends
item.description: Ghana's foreign minister says the influencer is a "worthy ambassador", but some Ghanaians criticised the move.

item.title: China trip will bring benefits to UK, Starmer insists, ahead of Xi meeting
item.description: The prime minister seeks to strengthen ties with China but faces fierce criticism from opponents at home.

item.title: Ex-Spandau Ballet star Ross Davidson guilty of rape
item.description: Ross Davidson, known as Ross Wild on stage, was known for singing with the 80s band Spandau Ballet.
